text: Ángel Maturino Reséndiz was a Canadian, Mexican, and American serial killer. He was born on August 1, 1959. He died on June 27, 2006. He murdered at least 16 or 15 people. Some people he murdered included: Norman J. Sirnic and Karen Sirnic (May 2, 1999), Fannie Whitney Byers (December 10, 1998), and Claudia Benton (December 17, 1998). He was executed on June 27, 2006. == References == Category:Executed American serial killers Category:1959 births Category:2006 deaths Category:People from Puebla (state)
title: Ángel Maturino Reséndiz
